<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">感谢软件作者给了这么好的一个工具，文档也写得好。我下载了一个视频<span lang="EN-US">Codec</span>的开源项目，由于我只需要解码（<span lang="EN-US">decode</span>）部分，那些庞大繁复的<span lang="EN-US">“</span>编码（<span lang="EN-US">encode</span>）<span lang="EN-US">”</span>过程可以不要，所以用这个工具试了一下，可以看出软件是强大的，可惜卡在系统头文件（<span lang="EN-US"> windows.h </span>之类）上了，虽然可以用<span lang="EN-US"> -include </span>参数来补充，但是不妨这样想，一来
这类系统头文件本身就不允许改写的，你去扫描分析并没有现实意义。二来系统自带的头文件 总是调用系统<span lang="EN-US">SDK</span>的，这类<span lang="EN-US">SDK</span>文件同样也是 分析出来也不能改写，所以完全可以略过不管，应该把软件设定为<span lang="EN-US">“</span>仅扫描项目<span lang="EN-US">dir</span>下的文件<span lang="EN-US">”</span>，这样既简单又安全。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">其实想优化<span lang="EN-US">SDK</span>头文件是很简单的，我们只需手工加上<span lang="EN-US"> // </span>注释掉<span lang="EN-US"> include <windows.h> </span>语句，然后看看编译会否出错就行了，如果出错，老老实实<span lang="EN-US"> include </span>吧，难道我们还敢打开<span lang="EN-US"> windows.h </span>去改它吗？？另外还有一个实际情况，<span lang="EN-US">SDK</span>里面基本就是 结构<span lang="EN-US">/</span>类 定义，然后就是大量调用系统<span lang="EN-US">DLL</span>函数，也就是一条一条的声明语句而已，实际上并没有多少执行代码。反之，如果有执行代码，那么往往就是很常用的，例如<span lang="EN-US"> printf </span>之类，所以<span lang="EN-US">SDK</span>的<span lang="EN-US">“</span>优化<span lang="EN-US">”</span>并没有现实意义。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">另外，这个软件不能识别<span lang="EN-US"> def </span>文件，对于<span lang="EN-US"> DLL </span>项目是一个缺陷。譬如在<span lang="EN-US"> def </span>文件中我 只需 输出<span lang="EN-US"> 2</span>个<span lang="EN-US"> DLL</span>函数，这样<span lang="EN-US"> dll.cpp
</span>里面其它<span lang="EN-US">“</span>无关<span lang="EN-US">”</span>的函数是可以优化的。当然折衷办法还是有的，可以另外写一个<span lang="EN-US"> fake.cpp</span>，里面仅包含这两个函数，然后单独优化这个<span lang="EN-US"> fake.cpp </span>即可。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">所以我建议作者优先解决<span lang="EN-US">“</span>略过 系统<span lang="EN-US">SDK</span>文件<span lang="EN-US">”</span>的问题，让这个软件在<span lang="EN-US">“</span>自然状态<span lang="EN-US">”</span>下能够跑起来，而不是频繁中断在<span lang="EN-US"> windows.h </span>等一堆<span lang="EN-US"> SDK </span>之下，抛出一个接一个<span lang="EN-US">error</span>，用户被迫不断修改命令行（变得<span lang="EN-US">“</span>水蛇春咁长<span lang="EN-US">”</span>），意兴阑珊。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">上图表示，文件<span lang="EN-US">B2</span>中的类或结构体仅被<span lang="EN-US">C1</span>用来声明指针或引用，除此之外<span lang="EN-US">B2</span>文件中的内容根本不被其他文件关心。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">处理办法：找到包含<span lang="EN-US">B2</span>的那条<span lang="EN-US">#include</span>语句，直接把那条语句替换成前置声明。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">比如，假设<span lang="EN-US">B2.h</span>中仅定义了<span lang="EN-US">class
B2_Class{ int n; }</span>，则把<span lang="EN-US">B1</span>文件中的<span lang="EN-US">#include
“B2.h”</span>语句替换成<span lang="EN-US">class B2_Class;</span>前置声明语句<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">3. </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">深层<span lang="EN-US">#include</span>取代浅层<span lang="EN-US">#include<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">以下图为例<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span
